defaultSeo.title: Kelvin Sanchez | Senior Software Engineer
defaultSeo.description: Kelvin Sanchez is a Senior Software Engineer, experienced in creating beautiful and functional websites and web applications.

heroData.paragraph: Passionate about coding, and making my client ideas come true.

aboutItems: I'm a Senior Software Engineer based in Spring, Texas.
I like to design and build beautiful and functional websites and web applications, taking special care to produce clear and understandable code.
I love teamwork and good communication, always open to feedback and willing to learn new things.
In my free time I like to play the guitar, read a good book or play videogames.
aboutData.resumeParagraph: You can check my resumé in the link below.
